oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Alexander C. Simmons tintype
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tintype of Alexander C. Simmons. He was born in 1847 to Travis and Mary (Pendergrass) Simmons. Simmons enlisted in Co. I, 4th Tenn. Cav., USA. He died on March 20, 1864, in Nashville and is buried in the National Cemetery there. The original tintype is in the holdings of the Bledsoe County Public Library.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Simmons, Alexander C.
